description:
Jamie has an interesting approach to girls.
"I like to play fight," he explained.
What exactly does that mean?
"Mess around with a girl," he said, "poke at her, have fun with her for a while, then just kind of wrestle with her."
The ultimate goal:
"So I can kind of get her angry or irritated at first."
I'm no expert, but I don't know that many girls who find that very enticing. Maybe the ones who like angry sex or something!
Anyway, Jamie is 19, straight, and lives with his girlfriend. He likes to box, and he has a smooth, muscular body and a thick cock!
title: Jamie
